sentences.sContent: The person arrested for setting the fire had been suspected of pyromania on two previous occasions.
sentences.sContent_eng: The person arrested for setting the fire had been suspected of pyromania on two previous occasions.
sentences.sCn: 此人在先前的两个场合中阻止扑灭火灾涉嫌有纵火癖。

trans.tranOther: the uncontrollable impulse and practice of setting things on fire
